abstract: Emergency cabinet meeting is held and Lebanese officials agree on plan to clear garbage clogging Beruit's streets; agriculture minister endorses plan in hopes of appeasing protesters demonstrating against perceived government corruption.
lead_paragraph: The plan, approved during an emergency cabinet meeting, gives municipalities a leading role in treating local waste and assigns two landfills.

headline.main: Lebanon: Officials Agree on Plan They Hope Will End Garbage Crisis
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Lebanon: Officials Agree on Plan They Hope Will End Garbage Crisis

snippet: The plan, approved during an emergency cabinet meeting, gives municipalities a leading role in treating local waste and assigns two landfills.
